headline: Synopsys Showcases Vision For AI-Driven, Software-Defined Automotive Engineering at CES 2026
summary: Synopsys, Inc. (NASDAQ: SNPS) is showcasing AI-driven and software-defined engineering solutions this week at CES that tackle one of the industry's biggest challenges: accelerating automotive engineering innovation in the age of AI while reducing cost and complexity. From intelligent system-level simulation to semiconductor design at the atomic scale, Synopsys enables automakers and suppliers to virtualize silicon and software development, predict system performance, and optimize reliability, cu

headline: SiMa.ai Announces First Integrated Capability with Synopsys to Accelerate Automotive Physical AI Development
summary: SiMa.ai today announced the first integrated capability resulting from its strategic collaboration with Synopsys. The joint solution provides a blueprint to accelerate architecture exploration and early virtual software development for AI-ready, next-generation automotive SoCs that support applications such as Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) and In-vehicle-Infotainment (IVI).

headline: Prediction: Synopsys Stock Will Soar Over the Next Decade. Here's 1 Nvidia-Related Reason Why.
summary: A recent deal with Nvidia will enhance this company's solutions and power its growth for many years.
